RESET_PASSWORD_REQUEST.SUBJECT: Karaoke Mugen Password Reset
RESET_PASSWORD_REQUEST.BODY:
Hello ${{username}},

you (or someone) requested a password reset for your account at {{host}}. If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

Please click the following link to create a new password:

{{url}}

This link will expire in two hours.

RESET_PASSWORD_DONE.SUBJECT: Karaoke Mugen Password has been reset
RESET_PASSWORD_DONE.BODY:
Hello {{username}},

your password has been successfully reset at {{host}}.



You should be able to login using your new password now.

IN_REVIEW.SUBJECT: [{{instance}}] Song pending approval: {{songname}}
IN_REVIEW.BODY:
Hello {{username}},

your song {{songname}} is currently being reviewed by the {{instance}} team.

It may be:
- Accepted
- Rejected
- Requiring changes on your part before being accepted.

In the latter two cases, you will receive another notification with the reasons for the temporary or permanent rejection.

CHANGES_REQUESTED.SUBJECT: [{{instance}}] Changes are required to your song: {{songname}}
CHANGES_REQUESTED.BODY:
Hello {{username}},

after review, changes are required to your song {{songname}}:

{{reason}}

You can contact the {{instance}} team via:

ACCEPTED.SUBJECT: [{{instance}}] Song added to the database: {{songname}}
ACCEPTED.BODY:
Hello {{username}},

congratulations, your song {{songname}} has been accepted! It will be added to the {{instance}} database shortly.
Thank you for contributing to the {{instance}} database!

REJECTED.SUBJECT: [{{instance}}] Song rejected: {{songname}}
REJECTED.BODY:
Hello {{username}},

your song {{songname}} has been rejected. Here are the reasons:

{{reason}}

If you would like to discuss this, please feel free to contact us via:

INBOX.CLEANUP_DAYS_ALERT: If you do not respond to this email, your song will be deleted after {{days}} days.
